Claim: "The young Asian girl is outside in the rubble."
Implication: "The young Asian girl is sitting on the ground in rubble."
Referring expressions: Young Asian girl, outside, rubble.  Young Asian girl, ground, rubble.
Properties: IsYoung(a),  IsOutside(c),  IsInRubble(b)  IsSitting(a),  IsOnGround(d),  IsInRubble(b)
Formula: (exists c (exists a (exists b (IsYoung(a) and IsOutside(c) and IsInRubble(b)))) & (forall e ( IsSitting(e) ->  IsYoung(e)))) -> (exists b (exists a (exists d (IsSitting(a) and IsOnGround(d) and IsInRubble(b)))))
